name: DedicatedWorkerGlobalScope.onmessage
description: The onmessage property of the DedicatedWorkerGlobalScope interface represents an EventHandler to be called when the message event occurs and bubbles through the Worker — i.e. when a message is sent to the worker using the Worker.postMessage method.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'DedicatedWorkerGlobalScope.onmessage' in HTML Living Standard.
